response.overview: More than 2 months have passed since Jona, and his family are locked in their physical and psychological four walls due to a worldwide pandemic. With each day of being isolated the tension between the family members increases drastically and the mental health of each of them tends to crumble. After verbal confrontation develops into physical harm between Jonaâ€™s parents, Jona decides to no longer stay in this emotionally toxic environment. He decides to run, but his attempt leads to tragic consequences.
response.title: Cecil Park Road.
